description:
‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è A little beauty with this splendid bag from Maison Herm√®s model Birkin size 30 in red leather and gold-plated jewelry.
It is complete with its bell, its two keys and its padlock.[[2] ]Inside a zipped pocket with Herm√®s inscription on the zip and a patch pocket.
Under the flap, inscription "Herm√®s Paris Made in France".
It is also written "Herm√®s Paris" on the strap and on the back the letter H in a square for the year 2004.
The bag has its orange dust bag and its storage box (box which is damaged but still practical to store it).[[ 2]]It has been worn with love and has a lovely patina. The corners are slightly rubbed (see the photos of the 4 corners which are part of the description).
The interior is clean.
Owning a Birkin in size 30 is a good compromise for transporting your belongings and if you prefer bigger or smaller, do not hesitate to look at our other bags on sale where we offer a Birkin 25 and a Birkin 40.
And with this pretty red color, this Birkin 30 bag will not pass unnoticed ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

description:
Herm√®s silk scarf BRACELETS DE LUMIERE
Designer: Annie Faivre
Year of issue: 2018
Dimensions: 90x90cm / 35 "x35" 

In great condition. Background is pale green with mint green hand rolled hems. Label of composition/care tag removed. Minor pulled thread present. Doesn‚Äôt come with the box but will be packed and sent with utmost care. üíåüíù

Design History: A trip through Africa, Asia and Oceania takes shape in this ring of ethnic bracelets. Annie Faivre is inspired by jewellery, primarily from her personal collection. The chosen models for this composition are in ivory, feathers, pearls, engraved seashells, jewel-encrusted wood, raffia, warthog tooth and silver. A child‚Äôs bracelet comes from Ivory Coast, a thick cuff of pearls with geometric motifs from Papua New Guinea, a model decorated with shells and feathers is from New Guinea, another, in coconut fibres, from the Solomon Islands‚Ä¶ Each of them tells the story of a people, of their tastes, their beliefs, their customs.

Designed by: Florence Manlik

DESIGN HISTORY:

This carr√© depicts three pieces from a recent fine jewelry collection by Pierre Hardy for Herm√®s. Inspired by jewelers' working drawings, Florence Manlik presents the exquisite detail of Hardy‚Äôs designs, for our tireless appreciation: each gem in its setting, each gold link in astonishing relief and a presence enhanced by the hint of the designer‚Äôs hand at work ‚Äì a jewel in the making. The pieces draw on diverse influences: the equestrian world is clearly evoked, as is a celebration of the Carr√© in all its glory, as they take their names from three Herm√®s classics: Brides de Gala, Della Cavalleria and Grand Apparat. Necklaces, tiaras, earrings and bracelets are arranged in a harmonious design, as if placed directly on a square of silk.

description: A most charming Hermes historical scarf, Early America celebrates the founding days of our country with cutouts and silhouettes depicting colonial people, animals and birds, and stylized flowers and vines. Designed by Francoise de la Perriere in 1981, this is the second of two versions of Early America - the best one - with a central cartouche of George and Martha Washington. Here, a pochette scarf in mousseline silk, in a rare scarlet colorway. Care tag attached. 45cm/17.5"

description:
Lovely rare Gucci Soho Disco bag in beige pink leather and light gold hardware.
Good used condition with usual signs of wear for a used bag.
CONDITION :
- Scattered dirty spots/marks in some places on the lining, would benefit from a refresh but nothing major Was cleaned in place so there is a slight smell from the cleaning agent but again nothing major.
- Scuffs/rubbing/darkening to corners but no damage
- Scratches on hardware
- A few tiny cracks on the glazing in a few places but not visible [[2 ]]- Softening of the leather with use resulting in a slight loss of shape
 Has been used, much loved and we will take care of it.
Very versatile, can be worn over the shoulder or across the body and fits a lot despite its small size. Ideal for a day or an evening and fits all everyday essentials.
Comes with dust cover, Gucci box and Gucci envelope with thank you card.
From a very clean smoke and pet free home.

New iconic model 2022.

For Hermes lovers who want to be special.


Hermes Geta bag made of Mysore goatskin. 
An untreated leather from India with a special grain.
H - clasp with silver and palladium plating and color-coordinated 
leather inlays, central compartment, two patch inner pockets.
 Adjustable shoulder strap for carrying over the shoulder or crossbody.

description:
Silk scarf 90 Herm√®s on The Beach

Current collection 2023!

The silk scarf 90 is an indispensable and timeless accessory in the Herm√®s wardrobe, which is not only about around the neck, but also as a belt, headband or turban.

Made in France
Design by Ugo Bienvenu

The little story[ [2]]
The illustrator Ugo Bienvenu stages the relaxed summer atmosphere and carefree holidays by the sea. A multitude of tourists cavort in a futuristic bathing resort inspired by American comics. A superhero flies over the rooftops of the city where daring youngsters have made themselves comfortable. A group of sparkling horses crosses a street in a race. Not far away, vacationers relax at the edge of a pool. Even a mermaid has taken refuge in the arms of a lifeguard! Characters taken from comic books and unusual automobiles populate this richly detailed design.

description: For sale is a beautiful vintage Hermes Kelly Retour bag, size 32 with gold hardware. It dates from 1986 and is made of golden Courchevel leather, which was discontinued in 2004 and replaced by Epsom leather. It comes with the original lock plus 2 keys, a shoulder strap (length 83 cm) and an additional shoulder strap in Herm√®s canvas (length 108 cm) and a dust bag. description:
Vintage Burgundy Hermes Kelly 32 from 1956 or 1978 (based on the
markings). Except for the corners on the back of the bag, the bag is in great
condition as I had it recently re-dyed. It would probably need to be re-dyed to
have the corners fixed if the new owner wishes. It does have minor scratches on
the hardware, which are not obvious. There is a scratch on the bottom of the
bag and another one inside the bag by the hardware. The key, lock, and zipper
on the inside pocket work and I believe they are original to the bag. The bag
comes with its key, lock, dust bag, and cards from Vestaire (where I bought it
in 2021) and a consignment store where the previous owner bought it from before
selling it on Vestiare. Fun fact the new owner would be at least its 5th owner
in its 50 or 65-year history.

description:
Reference: H003685S

Designed by Henri d'Origny
Dimensions: 90 x 90 cm | This square is rolled by hand. Collection 2021. This color cannot be found, I let you check for yourself. 

Worn twice! 

Drawn by Henri d'Origny

The King's Instruction in the exercise of riding a horse, thus was baptized the work of Antoine de Pluvinel, squire to Louis XIII, King of France and Navarre. This man understood, from the 17th century, that to train a horse ‚Äúkindness prevails over severity‚Äù. He created an academy in Paris and wrote this book illustrated with superb etchings by Crispin de Pas, in the form of an interview for the young king. The few plates which end this work describe in particular the bits whose use he recommends. Henri d'Origny connected these steels to reins of braided fabric: curves and volutes draw a decoration decorated with foliage in the style of the Grand Si√®cle. The design has been reworked in a bayadere version made of wide full bands and thin bands.

Don't hesitate if you have a question :)

description:
Never worn Herm√®s¬†"A vos crayons!" ("To Your Pencils!") 90cm scarf in silk with hand-rolled hems, made in France. Initially designed by Leigh P. Cooke in 2004, this scarf is part of the reissue from Spring/Summer 2008. This stunning design (which is deceptively simple, but has one of the highest number of colour frames per scarf that Herm√®s produced) is offered here in shades of gold and brown on an elegant black background and has a contrasting bright yellow hem.  ¬†

The scarf was never worn and is still in its initial folds. The care tag is present, the hems are plump and the silk is crisp and drapes beautifully. It does not come with a box, but will be packaged very carefully and I am happy to include the Herm√®s bag shown in the photo (or a bigger one upon request). 

The focal point of this design are the pencil shavings scattered in the center, while colourful crayons, in an imperfect alignment, surround them all along the edges. The playfulness is further enhanced by the different colours of the crayons, and the fact that they are in apparent scatter, most pointing towards the middle while the rest are pointing away, towards the extremities. The geometric rigour of the pencils is graciously embellished by the apparent disarray of the shavings, which appear three-dimensional, projecting shadows on the 'surface' of the scarf.

The story behind: ‚ÄúThe author created this design when his son, who had just finished school, brought him his coloured crayons and asked: "What am I going to do with all this?". Arranged on a sheet of paper, the crayons evoke a colourful design that expresses a father's love for his son.‚Äù

RRP ¬£415
title: Carr√© 90 silk silk handkerchief

description:
New in box with original tags

The Hermes L‚ÄôEtole Plume stole was issued in 2010.

Cream with silver and gold metallic thread ‚Äú H‚Äù logo.

Infinitely soft, elegant, and light‚Ä¶ Like a cloud of cotton and silk. The airy touch of the plume stole comes as an enchanting surprise.

It is made entirely by hand, according to rare artisanal know-how that has been preserved over time.

An invitation to travel, its silk is spun in India. The particularly fine threads are then dyed and woven in Nepal on a traditional shuttle loom.

Purchased at the Hermes store in Paris in 2010


Measures 60 x 200 cm

65% cotton 33% silk.

A very rare find.

description:
The Lindy is one of Herm√®s' most unique bags, with a whimsical twist and a laid-back edge.
This Cl√©mence taurillon Lindy 30 bag features silver jewelry, a zip closure and a shoulder strap.

Made in France
Color: Nata / Silver
Dimensions: W 30 x H 19 x D 16 cm
Reference: H073426CKI2 [[2 ]]
The Lindy can be worn in two ways:
You can carry the bag as a handbag and as a shoulder bag.
- Two tubular top handles
- Two separate sides, each with its own pull tab
- Classic Herm√®s turning clasp in the center
- Large interior with two pockets[ [2]] - Two outside pockets
- Five base studs on the bottom

Cl√©mence bull leather:
The leather is named in homage to the designer's daughter who introduced it into the collections,
this leather was developed for luggage and is the ultimate example of a tumbled grained leather.
This process softens the skin and brings a generous texture to the surface.
Appearance in collections: 1992
Appearance: Semi-matte, generous and irregular grain[[2] ]Touch: Soft and smooth
Touch: Flowing
Evolution over time: Becomes more flexible

State :
The bag is sold privately Herm√®s on sale and never worn. There is a small imperfection on the front of the bag.
This is barely noticeable, as you can see from the photos.
title: Lindy leather handbag

description:
Herm√®s Carre 45 / Gavroche 45 


Photographs taken by ‚ÄòHermes_Seller_99‚Äô


Herm√®s Baobab Cat Carre 45 Scarf, designed by Ardmore Artists, in a combination of Beige and Jaune Vif colours.

The design shows a luscious baobab flower, set off-centre, fully open with the lovely petals depicted with painterly swirls of rich colour.

When tied cowboy style, you can choose to highlight a corner showing more or fewer feathers, or the flower petals can come to the fore. The leopard tends to peep out however the scarf is tied!

Story behind: A mischievous leopard has slipped into the heart of a baobab Ô¨Çower. For the Zulu kings, this majestic big cat incarnated their noble status, while the baobab represented power and grace. The Ô¨Çowers of this colossal tree only open at dusk, just when the leopard ventures out in search of its prey. The play on composition blends the animal and the plant into a single being, haloed by a crown of white-speckled feathers. The Ardmore artists‚Äô collective works to promote the style and traditional imagery of the KwaZulu-Natal province of South Africa, where it was founded by F√©e Halsted in 1985.

Whether it's in your hair, around your neck or on a bag, this small-sized scarf is easy to wear and instantly transforms your look.

Dimensions: 45 cm x 45 cm 

Made in France

DESIGN HISTORY:

This carr√© depicts three pieces from a recent fine jewelry collection by Pierre Hardy for Herm√®s. Inspired by jewelers' working drawings, Florence Manlik presents the exquisite detail of Hardy‚Äôs designs, for our tireless appreciation: each gem in its setting, each gold link in astonishing relief and a presence enhanced by the hint of the designer‚Äôs hand at work ‚Äì a jewel in the making. The pieces draw on diverse influences: the equestrian world is clearly evoked, as is a celebration of the Carr√© in all its glory, as they take their names from three Herm√®s classics: Brides de Gala, Della Cavalleria and Grand Apparat. Necklaces, tiaras, earrings and bracelets are arranged in a harmonious design, as if placed directly on a square of silk.

_______

The extremely elusive ‚ÄúAux pays des spices‚Äù is a favourite among Annie Faivre‚Äôs designs.

Annie Faivre is a French artist, who has created numerous carres for the Maison Hermes.  She has built her reputation on her unique style, which is immediately recognizable and now loved by so many.  Her association with the Fashion House began in 1979, and 36 years and many scarves later (I believe 46 in all), she has a loyal fan base the world over and it is not uncommon for her scarves (first issue) to sell out.

her unique style and freshness, which she brought to the Hermes carre set her apart from her contemporaries at that time, that have catapulted her to the forefront of all the Hermes artists.  She is dearly loved, her scarves coveted by her loyal fans and her vintage designs are collected and sought after by many.

Dimensions 90x90cm
100% silk
Made in France
Issue : 2001
Hand rolled hem 

Good condition - small light stain as seen on photo

description:
It's Herm√®s, always incomparable
Shawl like new, just tried on "Patchwork Horse", by Nigel Peake (*)
superb shades of blue and turquoise green. Resolutely modern and geometric patterns. 140 cm on the side, it has everything "fair" (copyright / title / label and signature of the author) but I specify that the composition label is missing. It was coming apart on one side, I removed it and can't find it! It is a 65% cashmere and 35% silk shawl.
(*)"A skilfully composed patchwork reveals the silhouette of a horse. On a background of striated, striped, squared diamonds, the decorated animal of herringbone, lines and squares stands out and gives harmony and balance to this ensemble. Nigel Peake, an architect by training, shows us through the magic of this composition his mastery of geometry."

"Imperial Collections" after a drawing by Catherine Baschet 2015/2016 
Produced in collaboration with the Mus√©e des arts d√©coratifs, this Carr√© is inspired by Chinese cloisonn√© from the Ming and Qing periods. The so-called technique Floral and geometric patterns among which springs the horse, a highly symbolic Chinese animal, often associated with the dragon. A rare square in this color and perfectly versatile.

description:
Very beautiful Wash scarf "Le Timbalier" designed in 1961 by Marie-France H√©ron then reissued in 2020 in Wash in very few copies then in 2021 in the classic version, all quickly sold out. Our scarf is therefore a great classic and a collector's item that has never been worn with its label.


The secrets of an object

Until at the end of the Second Empire, the timpanist was responsible for beating the drum in French cavalry regiments. In full dress, the one in the center of this square designed in 1961 by Marie-Fran√ßoise H√©ron plays with panache. The royal coat of arms with two intertwined "Ls", visible on his instrument, evoke the 18th century. The frame, too, is dressed with brilliance. The ceremonial saddle and the bridle, like the decor, are dotted with sumptuous trimmings ornaments: tiebacks, braids, fringes and cords, not to mention the cartisanes, wooden discs dressed in silver and gold threads. or silk.

The Carr√© Wash

The Herm√®s scarf is reinvented to give birth to the Wash: a silk square with irresistible softness obtained thanks to a unique washing ritual.

description:
Hermes Hot Pink Silk'in Classic Leather Wallet

100% Authentic¬†

Hermes wallet in Epsom calfskin with "Astrologie" printed silk lining

In addition to leather, the Silk'In line of leather goods showcases silk in all its splendor. Printed, randomly cut or laminated, it adorns the inside of coin purses, wallets and cardholders as a concealed lining. The color and motifs unexpectedly appear when it is opened, while each season's creations are based on designs from the world of silk.\This printed leather takes its name from a town in south-east England that is famous for its horse races. Its fine, regular grain, obtained through machine-printing, has a striking, beautifully subtle dual tone.

First appeared in the collections: 2004
Appearance: Small, regular and slightly glossy grain; uniform; deep colors
Feel: Dry, with a slightly "up and down" grain
Hand: Round and firm
Change over time: Keeps its shape, scratch-resistant. The grain fades in areas exposed to a lot of contact or rubbing\\

Excellent Condition- Comes with Box¬†
title: Silk'in leather wallet

description:
Hermes Birkin 35 In Biscuit Swift Leather And Palladium Hardware


Photos of the actual item, taken by our team, offered by PLAMEXS

Dimensions: width - 35; height - 28; depth - 18 cm
Stamp: "L" Square
Made in France
Year of Manufacture - 2008



- Swift leather has a semi-matte, semi-smooth appearance. It can be scratched (like all leather), but surface scratches can be easily removed with a gentle swipe
- Finely grained surface, which makes it particularly soft and elastic to the touch
- Swift leather was discontinued by Herm√®s in 1999 and was reintroduced in 2005
- It is called Gulliver on bags made before 1999



- Signature Birkin twist lock
- Double top rolled leather handles
- The interior features a main compartment, a single zip pocket and one patch pocket

- Palladium Hardware (PHW)
- The 35 is still the most coveted size of Birkin


- All PLAMEXS items are thoroughly checked and authenticated by our in-house team of experts before they are listed for sale

- The bag is in good vintage condition


- Interior - no odor; minimal signs of use; the conditon is visible in the photos - no other/hidden flaws to mention
- Exterior - rubs of the corners and edges (shown in the photos); small scratches on hardware; the condition is visible in the photos - no other/hidden flaws to mention
- Comes with: Herm√®s Maintenance Instruction Booklet; raincover; clochette and two keys
- Note: no padlock available

description:
Hermes scarf in 100% pure silk ‚ÄúChasse in India‚Äù. Intense coral pink color with central light pink insert. In the design, several animals in anthracite gray and human figures. 

History:
Designed in 1985 for the Year of India, Chasse en Inde is inspired by a silk bed throw embroidered with gold thread from Benares. It was displayed in the dining room of the Indian Ambassador to France as a decorative wall hanging. The refined, luxurious design is reminiscent of an illumination. Hunting scenes are repeated to infinity on a series of bands, calling to mind block-print Indian textiles.
title: Gavroche 45 silk neckerchief

description:
A little marvel with this splendid large bag from Maison Herm√®s üß° Birkin model üß° size 40 in cola-colored Togo leather (brown with a slight shade of red) and gold-plated jewelry. 
 Ordered made in 1991 with choice of leather and color (on a photo you can see one of the leather and its indicated color provided by Herm√®s). 
It has its bell with its two keys and padlock numbered 111. 
Inside a zipped pocket with Herm√®s inscription on the zip and a patch pocket. 
Under the flap, inscription ‚ÄúHerm√®s Paris Made in France‚Äù. 
It is also written ‚ÄúHerm√®s Paris‚Äù on the sanglon and on the back the letter U circled for the year 1991 and the number 17 with a small symbol (internal code for Herm√®s). 
Very good general condition for this vintage bag with very slightly rubbed corners. 
A mythical bag that increases in value every year. 
üß°üß°üß°

description:
Hermes scarf
The silk tree

Designer: Antoine de Jacquelot

The case of the mulberry tree does honor to the craftsmanship that knows how to base refinement on a diversion. This tree gave fruits but the East was not satisfied with it and raised it for the natural shelter it offered to the moth, a butterfly whose larva produces silk thread. Similar to the R√©miz, this tit which weaves a very solid nest using all sorts of fibers picked up here and there, man builds his luxury with what he knows how to discover.

Published in 1995, republished in 1998
Sold without box

Made of silk

Very good condition, like new: swollen rolled edges, no pulled thread, no hole, no stain, no discoloration.

description:
Looking for all the world like her big sister, Herm√®s‚Äô Etain Epsom Constance To Go Wallet is a crossbody in disguise! Gold-tone hardware is a good match for this neutral-colored carry and takes center stage in the flap‚Äôs magnetic closure that opens by lifting the center of the H to reveal a slide pocket on the face. The matching-colored-leather lining has one long zipped pocket with a space on either side, two long slide pockets, and six card slots. New and never worn from 2020 (Y stamp), it comes with plastic on the hardware and a box. The detachable all-leather strap has a 21.5-inch drop and surprise, surprise, there‚Äôs a slide pocket on the back face of this versatile carry!

title: Panama

description:
"Transformation cars"
Designer: Fran√ßoise de la Perri√®re
"Universal panorama of high bodywork and upholstery, London Universal Exhibition in 1851, by Guillon"... This album is kept in the Emile Hermes collection. The particularly dynamic French and international coachwork of the mid-19th century demonstrated great inventiveness, combining aesthetics and technical innovation. For example, a Parisian workshop presented, on the occasion of this exhibition, a coupe whose windows were operated by simply pressing a button or even a modular carriage. Convertible cars were then in vogue in France, as evidenced by these ancestors of convertibles which surround a caning motif, an ornament very popular at the time to decorate car bodies.
Published in 1965, reissued in 1980 and 2013. Here it is the 2013 edition, revised, modernized

description:
This Herm√®s scarf "Petite Abeille" is designed by studio Herm√®s. 

The scarf is in mint/excellent condition - it is new and unused.

The scarf is printed on jacquard silk with the so-called "bee" pattern - this is an integral part of the design and a very exceptional combination with the bees printed on the jacquard silk!

The Arfon dictionary of art scarves classifies this scarf as grade 2C.

The scarf is characterized by the beautiful combination of white and orange colors, combined with a nice pattern of bees woven into the silk used for the Hermes scarf - all of this gives the scarf an exceptional and extra exclusive look.

A rare scarf in this condition is a true collectors item, but it can also be worn on a daily basis.

Hermes always uses the best quality silk - the scarf feels velvety and is a real pleasure to wear.
title: Silk scarf

Herm√®s new beautiful Carre Nano Bride de Gala silk scarf. Very pretty and versatile.

Silk twill scarf with hand-rolled edges (100% silk).

[ [2]]The Herm√®s scarf in a mini version! Great meticulousness and craftsmanship were required to delicately reproduce the details of the design on this smaller format. This adorable scarf can be tied around the wrist or ankle, or tucked away in a pocket.


Colors: Pink Fuchsia: White: Black (Pink: White: Black)[[ 2]]
Designed by Hugo Grygkar

Dimensions: 20 x 20cm | As this scarf is rolled by hand, the dimensions indicated may vary.

Made in France


The story: Brides de Gala, arguably Herm√®s' most famous scarf, has never lost its power of seduction. The aesthetics of the flamboyant straps and the perfection of its composition make it the very image of the timeless spirit of Herm√®s. His name, brief and precise, has the brilliance of a ceremonial outfit. It evokes the clicking of curls to the rhythm of the majestic pace of horses.
